#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int ans[10000001];
int main()
{
   int t;
   long long k,temp,n=0,i;
 
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>k;
       n=0;
       if(k==1)
        cout<<"0"<<endl;
       else
       {
       while(k>1)
       {
           temp=k%5;
           if(temp==0)
            k=k/5;
           else
            k=k/5+1;
           if(temp==0)
            temp=4;
           else
            temp--;
           ans[++n]=temp*2;
       }
       for(i=n;i>0;i--)
        cout<<ans[i];
       cout<<endl;
       }
   }
   return 0;
}
